zone.line: the contemplations (if they were so engaged)
of the strangers by addressing in the clear
& exact but unidiomatic phrases of
their native language
are two; you see
Strangers you see before you the
behold
before you the third in this great
spectacle
city to whom alone the sight of this these
mighty fabric ruins
glorious decay is more delightful than
the mockeries of a superstition which
destroyed them & now insults them
I see nothing said the old Man
What do you here then?
sweet
I listen to the singing of the birds, & the
sound of my daughters breathing composes
and I feel the warm sunny air
me like the soft murmur of waters, & this
is pleasant to me.
Wretched old man know you not that these
are the ruins of the Coliseum
Alas stranger said the girl in a voice
